north_star: To provide comprehensive visibility into system performance, health, and behavior to ensure reliable and efficient software operations.
mission: To implement and maintain observability tools and practices that enable proactive monitoring, troubleshooting, and optimization of software systems.
vision: To achieve a state of continuous observability where system insights drive operational excellence and rapid incident resolution.

core.description: Individuals or teams directly utilizing observability tools and insights.
core.value: Product Engineering Teams, Backend Development Teams, Operations Team

supportive.description: Individuals or teams that influence or support the Observability team's initiatives.
supportive.value: Platform Engineering Team, DevX Team, Delivery Team

peripheral.description: External or less directly involved stakeholders who have an interest in the Observability team's outcomes.

kpis.objective: Reduce mean time to detection (MTTD) of incidents.
kpis.justification: Faster detection of incidents leads to quicker resolution and less downtime.
kpis.measurement: Average time taken to detect incidents.
kpis.outbound: Monthly incident detection reports to Operations and Engineering Teams

kpis.objective: Increase coverage of observability metrics and logs.
kpis.justification: Comprehensive coverage ensures all critical aspects of the system are monitored.
kpis.measurement: Percentage of systems and services covered by observability tools.
kpis.outbound: Quarterly coverage reports to Engineering Teams

kpis.objective: Enhance accuracy and relevance of alerts.
kpis.justification: Accurate alerts reduce noise and help teams focus on real issues.
kpis.measurement: Percentage of false positives and false negatives in alerts.
kpis.outbound: Monthly alert accuracy reports to Engineering Teams

kpis.objective: Improve developer satisfaction with observability tools.
kpis.justification: Positive feedback indicates useful and user-friendly observability solutions.
kpis.measurement: Developer satisfaction scores from internal surveys.
kpis.outbound: Quarterly satisfaction reports to Engineering Leadership

kpis.justification: Faster resolution minimizes the impact of incidents on end-users and business operations.
kpis.measurement: Average time taken to resolve incidents.
kpis.outbound: Monthly incident resolution reports to Operations and Engineering Teams
